title: Samoa
creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit and Stanhope Andrews
brief_description: A survey of native life, customs and cultural activities in Western Samoa. The islanders are seen at work - making baskets, and copra, picking coconuts, bread0frut, and bananas, building a church, and fishing. Glimpses inside hospitals and medical centres illustrate the work being undertaken in safeguarding the health of the native. Recreational activities include Samoa cricket, singing and dancing.
